articles.title: 2020 Democratic candidates ringing in the new year with supporters
articles.description: Democratic presidential candidate Andrew Yang says he’s not going to get too crazy on New Year’s Eve. Yang is one of a bunch of 2020 Democratic presidential candidates to ring in the new year with supporters.
articles.content:
PORTSMOUTH, N.H. – Democratic presidential candidate Andrew Yang says he’s not going to get too crazy on New Year’s Eve.
